Class MultiPlayerGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • MultiPlayerGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game

    class MultiPlayerGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game
    Class Desc: MultiPlayer implementation of Game class to play Card game between several human and computer players.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Player> players
      Holds each Player in the game.

      Scanner for User Input.

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Method to create players and ask for computer difficulty. Asks for user input and calls addPlayers(), playRound() and createCard() methods.
        Specified by:
        startGame in interface Game

      • addPlayers

        private void addPlayers(int pNum,
                        int cNum)

      • createCard

        private void createCard()
        Method to create cards and assign them to decks. Adds cards to a CopyOnWriteArrayList (which is thread) friendly and assigns Cards to Players.

      • assignCard

        private void assignCard(Card assignCard,
                        Player assignPlayer)
        Method to assign Cards to Players in turn. Assigns the Card to the Player objects that are passed as parameters.
        Parameters:
        assignCard - - The Card to be assigned
        assignPlayer - - The player to whom the Card is assigned

      • playRound

        private void playRound(int playerRef,
                       int roundNum)
        Method to carry out the game procedure. Plays a round and makes call to compare cards method.
        Parameters:
        playerRef - - The reference number for the Player whose turn it is.
        roundNum - - The round number.
